com.github.protobufel.resource.exec.maven.plugin

Class ExecMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.github.protobufel.resource.exec.maven.plugin.ExecMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="exec",
      defaultPhase=GENERATE_TEST_RESOURCES,
      requiresProject=true)
@Description(value="Executes the specified command")
public class ExecMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
